data.title: Migrate high-volume tables to BIGINT primary keys
data.description: Current INT(11) primary keys on workspace_neural_observations and workspace_neural_entities will overflow at scale. Need to migrate to BIGINT before production traffic increases. Requires careful migration with zero downtime.

data.title: Optimize Redis connection pooling and rate limiting
data.description: Redis connection exhaustion under load causing timeouts in the early-access tier. Need to implement connection pooling and optimize rate limiting queries to reduce Redis round-trips.

pull_request.title: perf(early-access): optimize Redis and rate limiting
pull_request.body:
## Summary
Optimizes Redis connection pooling and rate limiting logic for the early-access tier.

## Changes
- Refactored Redis client to use connection pooling with configurable pool size
- Implemented sliding window rate limiting with atomic Lua scripts
- Reduced P95 latency on rate-limited endpoints by ~40%

## Testing
- [x] Load tested with 1000 concurrent connections
- [x] Verified rate limit accuracy under high throughput
- [x] No regression in existing Redis operations

pull_request.title: feat(www): upgrade to Next.js 16 with pnpm named catalogs
pull_request.body:
## Summary
Upgrades the www app to Next.js 16 and migrates shared dependencies to pnpm named catalogs for better version management across the monorepo.

## Changes
- Upgraded `apps/www` to Next.js 16
- Migrated shared deps to `catalog:` protocol in workspace packages
- Updated turbo pipeline for new Next.js build output

## Testing
- [x] Full build passes across all workspaces
- [x] Verified www app renders correctly on Next.js 16
- [x] No breaking changes in shared packages

event.title: Slow Transaction: /api/trpc/search.query (p95 > 4500ms)
event.message: Transaction /api/trpc/search.query exceeded p95 latency threshold of 2000ms

data.title: Investigate and resolve search P95 latency regression
data.description: Sentry performance monitoring detected /api/trpc/search.query P95 latency exceeding 4500ms (threshold: 2000ms). Likely related to the docs search provider - Mixedbread native integration should resolve the external API dependency bottleneck.

pull_request.title: fix: enable env validation on Vercel production builds
pull_request.body:
## Summary
Enables environment variable validation during Vercel production builds to catch missing or misconfigured env vars before deployment.

## Changes
- Added build-time env validation using `@t3-oss/env-nextjs`
- Configured validation to run in Vercel CI environment
- Added fallback handling for optional env vars

## Testing
- [x] Verified build passes with all required env vars
- [x] Verified build fails with clear error when required vars missing
- [x] Tested in preview and production Vercel environments

repository.name: lightfast
repository.description: AI agent orchestration platform - neural memory for engineering teams

data.title: Investigate and resolve search P95 latency regression
data.description: Sentry performance monitoring detected /api/trpc/search.query P95 latency exceeding 4500ms (threshold: 2000ms). Resolved by Mixedbread native integration removing the external API dependency bottleneck.

data.body:
## Phase 1 Infrastructure Complete

Major infrastructure milestones delivered over the past two months:

**Security**
- Updated Next.js/React to patch CVE-2025-55182 (Sentry SEC-182 resolved same day)
- Implemented webhook payload validation and sanitization
- Unified API key format to `sk-lf-` with 256-bit entropy
- Enabled env validation on Vercel production builds (#358)

**Database & Performance**
- Migrated high-volume tables to BIGINT primary keys (LF-385)
- Optimized Redis connection pooling and rate limiting (LF-390, PR #343)
- Added Clerk API caching for org membership lookups
- Added GitHub Action for PlanetScale database migrations

**Neural Memory Pipeline**
- Day 2 search with metadata filters and LLM gating
- Day 5 multi-view embeddings and 4-path retrieval
- Cross-source actor resolution and identity linking
- Braintrust integration for AI observability
- Analytics metrics for actor_resolution and cluster_affinity

**Observability & Infra**
- Raw webhook payload storage for permanent retention
- Migrated docs search to Mixedbread native integration
- Search P95 latency regression investigated and resolved (LF-395, Sentry PERF-P95)
- Upgraded www app to Next.js 16 with pnpm named catalogs (#350)

All 3 critical Linear issues (LF-385, LF-390, LF-395) completed. All systems stable. Ready to begin Phase 2 work.
